    • Method Detail

      • setPort

        public HostTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setPort(java.lang.Long port)
        The port of the host. If null, port 443 will be used.
        Parameters:
        port - New value for the property.

      • setFolder

        public HostTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setFolder(java.lang.String folder)
        Host and cluster folder in which the new standalone host should be created. This property is currently required. In the future, if this property is null, the system will attempt to choose a suitable folder for the host; if a folder cannot be chosen, the host creation operation will fail.
        Parameters:
        folder - New value for the property. When clients pass a value of this class as a parameter, the property must be an identifier for the resource type: Folder. When methods return a value of this class as a return value, the property will be an identifier for the resource type: Folder.

      • setThumbprint

        public HostTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setThumbprint(java.lang.String thumbprint)
        The thumbprint of the SSL certificate, which the host is expected to have. The thumbprint is always computed using the SHA1 hash and is the string representation of that hash in the format: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx where, 'x' represents a hexadecimal digit. This property is optional and it is only relevant when the value of getThumbprintVerification() is HostTypes.CreateSpec.ThumbprintVerification.THUMBPRINT.
        Parameters:
        thumbprint - New value for the property.

      • setForceAdd

        public HostTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setForceAdd(java.lang.Boolean forceAdd)
        Whether host should be added to the vCenter Server even if it is being managed by another vCenter Server. The original vCenterServer loses connection to the host. If null, forceAdd is default to false.
        Parameters:
        forceAdd - New value for the property.

      • build

        public HostTypes.CreateSpec build()
